sqlMap.select:
select fr.FIELD_REQUIRED_ID, fr.REQUIRED as FLD_REQ_REQUIRED, fr.SECTION_NAME as FLD_REQ_SECTION_NAME, fr.SITE_NAME as FLD_REQ_SITE_NAME,
, , , ,
from FIELD_REQUIRED fr inner join FIELD_DEFINITION fd on fr.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION sfd on fr.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = sfd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_CONDITION fc on fr.FIELD_REQUIRED_ID = fc.FIELD_REQUIRED_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION condFd on fc.DEPENDENT_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = condFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION secCondFd on fc.DEPENDENT_SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = secCondFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID
where ((fr.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) or (fr.SITE_NAME is NULL)) and fr.SECTION_NAME = #sectionName# and fr.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinitionId#
and fr.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinitionId#
and fr.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID is NULL
sqlMap.insert:
insert into FIELD_REQUIRED (FIELD_REQUIRED_ID, REQUIRED, SECTION_NAME, SITE_NAME, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID) values (#id#, #required#, #sectionName#, #site.name#, #fieldDefinition.id#, #secondaryFieldDefinition.id#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update FIELD_REQUIRED set REQUIRED = #required#, SECTION_NAME = #sectionName#, SITE_NAME = #site.name#, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinition.id#, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinition.id# where FIELD_REQUIRED_ID = #id#
